Classes

class  voxblox::IntensityIntegrator
 Integrates intensities from a set of bearing vectors (i.e., an intensity image, such as a thermal image) by projecting them onto the TSDF surface and coloring near the surface crossing. More...

 voxblox
 These classes allocate a fixed size array and index it with a hash that is masked so that only its first N bits are non zero.
